The lace detail adds just the right amount of “I made an effort” without you actually having to make one. It’s like your top decided to dress up for the occasion, but in that effortlessly chic way that makes people think you’ve got your life together—even if your breakfast was just a cup of coffee and a side of panic.  And let’s talk about how this shirt is basically a miracle worker for those days when you’ve indulged in one too many snacks (hey, it happens). The tunic length is perfect for covering all the bits you want to keep under wraps, while still letting you strut your stuff. It’s like a magic curtain that says, “I’m comfortable, I’m stylish, and yes, I will have another slice of cake, thank you very much.”

I give this seller an A+++ for fast shipping a quality product at an reasonable price.

评论概述: The fit and comfort in this blouse is wonderful!
评论详情: I bought this blouse to wear to my sons wedding because I didn’t want to wear a skirt or dress due to scars on my leg from an accident. This blouse was so comfortable it was not hot and the temperature was 104 outside in Missouri so you know the humidity was outrageous, but I was cool And it looked beautiful the entire day I took it straight out of the package not thinking and put it on. The wrinkles just fell out. I love this shirt and I will be buying more of them. You will love it too. I promise you.

I love this top! It's my favorite shirt to wear now! I got it for my daughter's wedding and it was beyond comfortable! It looked good on me and that is something for me to say because it's very difficult for me to like anything I wear! Not only was this top great for the wedding, but I wear it for everyday wear now too! Will definitely be getting more in different prints/colors!

When I saw this shirt, I loved the way it looked, but I worried that the lace panels on the side would be irritating when my arms rubbed against them. I was wrong. The lace stretches well with the shirt and is as soft as lace can be. I find it comfortable. If you have really sensitive skin or are planning to walk a long time while swinging your arms, you may want to consider passing on this one. Otherwise, it's perfect. It's stretchy, light but not see-through, and very comfortable.

评论概述: Great for the tall, plus size ladies
评论详情: Ok first, I'm so happy that I finally found a shirt that fits my frame really well. Everything about me is long, and my tummy is big. The lines that this shirt creates makes my stomache look smaller with more emphasis on how long my legs are, which is really nice. I sized up two sizes which made it very nice and flowy. It's a light but quality buttery soft material. The lace is lined so it's not itchy. This might be my new favourite comfy shirt. I will order more, possibly in every color.

If you are on the bigger size (like me) then you'll want to check out this shirt and all the other shirts this company has! You will love them, I promise.  Trying to find a nice shirt for a big girl is so hard, but this shirt is so comfy, it is long enough to cover all those spots I don't want to show off and makes the ladies look amazing!  It is soft and lightweight, not made out of that cheap really thin material I've come across while buying online.  I liked this shirt so much I've ordered several from them.  Everyone has been great.  If you are a bigger girl you won't go wrong buying this one!

Fit is what you'd expect from Asia designers, tight, so size up one size. This means its actually true to size for what they say, its just American Designers put the size but give a generous cut for the style.  Colors are very pretty, material is very soft and summer weight.  If like me you were worried about the lace inset, its over the top of material which isn't easy to see in the pictures. Shirt is very clingy, its loose on me but...I went up a size and could have gone up 2 for a easy swing/loose style.  Doesn't  wrinkle I threw it in the wash with everything else then the dryer and forgot about it for a day, and it was wrinkle free.  Great shirt for the price, and super pretty.  I hope to see more from this brand.

评论概述: Clingy and so long it's a dress

Absolutely love this shirt !!!! I'll be buying more for sure!! Flowy, I did go up 2 sizes to give more flow. I'm normally a 2x/3x top... 5x gave best bum coverage and doesn't cling to the belly. I love flowy tops, if your a plus size gal that wants a flowy top not clinging, but long enough to be modest to wear with leggings, this is your top, just get 5x ... love love !!! It hits a little higher than mid thigh. I can't say enough how amazing this top is, Plz get this shirt you will love it. Like I said I'm going back to get more.
